NetSparkleUpdater.​ReleaseNotesGrabber
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​ReleaseNotesGrabber

Grabs release notes formatted as Markdown (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown) from the server and allows you to view them as HTML

Variables
_separatorTemplate
protected string _separatorTemplate

The HTML template to use between each changelog for every update between the most current update and the one that the user is going to install

_initialHTML
protected string _initialHTML

The initial HTML to use for the changelog. This is everything before the body tag and includes the html and head elements/tags.

_sparkle
protected SparkleUpdater _sparkle

The SparkleUpdater for this ReleaseNotesGrabber. Mostly used for logging via LogWriter, but also can be used to grab other information about updates, etc.

MarkdownExtensions
public static readonly List<string> MarkdownExtensions

List of supported extensions for markdown files (.md, .mkdn, .mkd, .markdown)

Properties
ChecksReleaseNotesSignature
public bool ChecksReleaseNotesSignature { get; set }

Whether or not to check the signature of the release notes after they've been downloaded. Defaults to false.

Functions
ReleaseNotesGrabber
public ReleaseNotesGrabber(
string separatorTemplate,
string htmlHeadAddition,
SparkleUpdater sparkle
)

Base constructor for ReleaseNotesGrabber

Parameters
separatorTemplate
string

Template to use for separating each item in the HTML

htmlHeadAddition
string

Any additional header information to stick in the HTML that will show up in the release notes

sparkle
SparkleUpdater

Sparkle updater being used

GetLoadingText
public virtual string GetLoadingText()

Generates the text to display while release notes are loading

Returns

HTML to show to the user while release notes are loading

DownloadAllReleaseNotes
public virtual async Task<string> DownloadAllReleaseNotes(
List<AppCastItem> items,
AppCastItem latestVersion,
CancellationToken cancellationToken
)

Asynchronously download all of the release notes provided to this function and convert them to HTML

Parameters
items
List<AppCastItem>

List of items that you want to display in the release notes

latestVersion
AppCastItem

The latest version (most current version) of your releases

cancellationToken
CancellationToken

Token to cancel the async download requests

Returns

The release notes formatted as HTML and ready to display to the user

GetReleaseNotes
protected virtual async Task<string> GetReleaseNotes(
AppCastItem item,
SparkleUpdater sparkle,
CancellationToken cancellationToken
)

Grab the release notes for the given item and return their release notes in HTML format so that they can be displayed to the user.

Parameters
item
AppCastItem

AppCastItemitem to download the release notes for

sparkle
SparkleUpdater

SparkleUpdater that can be used for logging information about the release notes grabbing process (or its failures)

cancellationToken
CancellationToken

token that can be used to cancel a release notes grabbing operation

Returns

The release notes, formatted as HTML, for a given release of the software

DownloadReleaseNotes
protected virtual async Task<string> DownloadReleaseNotes(
string link,
CancellationToken cancellationToken,
SparkleUpdater sparkle
)

Download the release notes at the given link. Does not do anything else for the release notes (verification, display, etc.) -- just downloads the release notes and passes them back as a string.

Parameters
link
string

string URL to the release notes to download

cancellationToken
CancellationToken

token that can be used to cancel a download operation

sparkle
SparkleUpdater

SparkleUpdater that can be used for logging information about the download process (or its failures)

Returns

The release notes data (file data) at the given link as a string. Typically this data is formatted as markdown.
